verses.verse: <S%G1722><s%> And In <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2250><s%> That Day <S%G1565><s%> Having Gone Forth <S%G1831><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Sat Down <S%G2521><s%> By <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea. <S%G2281><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Were Gathered Together <S%G4863><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> Great, <S%G4183><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> Having Entered <S%G1684><s%> Sat Down, <S%G2521><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Shore <S%G123><s%> Stood. <S%G2476><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Spoke <S%G2980><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Many Things <S%G4183><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Parables, <S%G3850><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Went Out <S%G1831><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sower <S%G4687><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Sow. <S%G4687><s%>

<S%G243><s%> And Some <S%G1161><s%> Fell <S%G4098><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rocky Places, <S%G4075><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Had Not <S%G2192><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> , Much, <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Sprang Up <S%G1816><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Depth <S%G899><s%> Of Earth; <S%G1093><s%>

<S%G2246><s%> And The Sun <S%G1161><s%> Having Risen <S%G393><s%> They Were Scorched, <S%G2739><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Root <S%G4491><s%> Were Dried Up. <S%G3583><s%>

<S%G243><s%> And Some <S%G1161><s%> Fell <S%G4098><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Thorns, <S%G173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Grew Up <S%G305><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Thorns <S%G173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Choked <S%G638><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G243><s%> And Some <S%G1161><s%> Fell <S%G4098><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ground <S%G1093><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Good, <S%G2570><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Yielded <S%G1325><s%> , Fruit, <S%G2590><s%> <S%G3739><s%> One <S%G3303><s%> , A Hundred, <S%G1540><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Another <S%G1161><s%> Sixty, <S%G1835><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Another <S%G1161><s%> Thirty. <S%G5144><s%>
He That <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> Ears <S%G3775><s%> , To Hear <S%G191><s%> Let Him Hear. <S%G191><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come To Him <S%G4334><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Parables <S%G3850><s%> Speakest Thou <S%G2980><s%> To Them? <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> It Has Been Given <S%G1325><s%> To Know <S%G1097><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mysteries <S%G3466><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens, <S%G3772><s%> <S%G1565><s%> But To Them <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Has Not Been Given. <S%G1325><s%>

Whosoever <S%G3748><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Has, <S%G2192><s%> Shall Be Given <S%G1325><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Shall Be In Abundance; <S%G4052><s%> <S%G3748><s%> But Whosoever <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Has Not, <S%G2192><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> He Has <S%G2192><s%> Shall Be Taken Away <S%G142><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Parables <S%G3850><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> I Speak, <S%G2980><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Seeing <S%G991><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They See Not, <S%G991><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hearing <S%G191><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Hear Not, <S%G191><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Do They Understand. <S%G4920><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Is Filled Up <S%G378><s%> ' In <S%G1909><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophecy <S%G4394><s%> Of Isaiah, <S%G2268><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Says, <S%G3004><s%> In Hearing <S%G189><s%> Ye Shall Hear, <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Understand; <S%G4920><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Seeing <S%G991><s%> Ye Shall See, <S%G991><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Perceive : <S%G1492><s%>

<S%G3975><s%> For Has Grown Fat <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2992><s%> Of This People, <S%G5127><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Ears <S%G3775><s%> Heavily <S%G917><s%> They Have Heard, <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3788><s%> Their Eyes <S%G846><s%> They Have Closed; <S%G2576><s%> Lest <S%G3379><s%> They Should See <S%G1492><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Eyes, <S%G3788><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Ears <S%G3775><s%> They Should Hear, <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> They Should Understand, <S%G4920><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Should Be Converted <S%G1994><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Should Heal <S%G2390><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G5216><s%> But Of You <S%G1161><s%> Blessed Are <S%G3107><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Eyes, <S%G3788><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> They See; <S%G991><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ears <S%G3775><s%> Of You, <S%G5216><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> They Hear. <S%G191><s%>

<S%G281><s%> For Verily <S%G1063><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Prophets <S%G4396><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Righteous Men <S%G1342><s%> Desired <S%G1937><s%> To See <S%G1492><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> Ye See, <S%G991><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Saw; <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Hear <S%G191><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> Ye Hear, <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Heard Not. <S%G191><s%>
Ye <S%G5210><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Hear <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Parable <S%G3850><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sower. <S%G4687><s%>

<S%G3956><s%> When Any One Hears <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not It <S%G3361><s%> Understands, <S%G4920><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wicked One <S%G4190><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Catches Away <S%G726><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Sown <S%G4687><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> His Heart. <S%G846><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> By <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> Was Sown. <S%G4687><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He Who <S%G1161><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rocky Places <S%G4075><s%> , Was Sown, <S%G4687><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Hears <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2117><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> Receives <S%G2983><s%> It; <S%G846><s%>

No <S%G3756><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Root <S%G4491><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Himself, <S%G1438><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Temporary <S%G4340><s%> Is; <S%G2076><s%> <S%G1096><s%> But Having Risen <S%G1161><s%> Tribulation <S%G2347><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Persecution <S%G1375><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%> Immediately <S%G2117><s%> He Is Offended. <S%G4624><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He Who <S%G1161><s%> Among <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Thorns <S%G173><s%> , Was Sown, <S%G4687><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Hears, <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Care <S%G3308><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G165><s%> Of This Life <S%G5127><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Deceit <S%G539><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Riches <S%G4149><s%> Choke <S%G4846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Unfruitful <S%G175><s%> It Becomes. <S%G1096><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He Who <S%G1161><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ground <S%G1093><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> , Was Sown, <S%G4687><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Hears <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Understands; <S%G4920><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Indeed <S%G1211><s%> Brings Forth Fruit, <S%G2592><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Produces <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3739><s%> One <S%G3303><s%> , A Hundred, <S%G1540><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Another <S%G1161><s%> , Sixty, <S%G1835><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Another <S%G1161><s%> Thirty. <S%G5144><s%>

Another <S%G243><s%> Parable <S%G3850><s%> Put He Before <S%G3908><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Has Become Like <S%G3666><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> To A Man <S%G444><s%> Sowing <S%G4687><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> Seed <S%G4690><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G68><s%> His Field; <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1722><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> While Slept <S%G2518><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Enemy <S%G2190><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sowed <S%G4687><s%> Darnel <S%G2215><s%> In The <S%G303><s%> Midst <S%G3319><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Wheat, <S%G4621><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Went Away. <S%G565><s%>

<S%G3753><s%> And When <S%G1161><s%> Sprouted <S%G985><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Blade, <S%G5528><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> Produced, <S%G4160><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> Appeared <S%G5316><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Darnel. <S%G2215><s%>

Having Come To Him <S%G4334><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bondmen <S%G1401><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Master Of The House <S%G3617><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Sir, <S%G2962><s%> Not <S%G3780><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> Seed <S%G4690><s%> Didst Thou Sow <S%G4687><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Thy <S%G4674><s%> Field? <S%G68><s%> Whence <S%G4159><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Has It <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Darnel? <S%G2215><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G5346><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> An Enemy <S%G2190><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Did. <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And The <S%G1161><s%> Bondmen <S%G1401><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Wilt Thou <S%G2309><s%> Then That <S%G3767><s%> Having Gone Forth <S%G565><s%> We Should Gather <S%G4816><s%> Them? <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> , Said, <S%G5346><s%> No; <S%G3756><s%> Lest <S%G3379><s%> Gathering <S%G4816><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Darnel, <S%G2215><s%> Ye Should Uproot <S%G1610><s%> With <S%G260><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wheat. <S%G4621><s%>

Suffer <S%G863><s%> To Grow Together <S%G4885><s%> Both <S%G297><s%> Until <S%G3360><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Harvest; <S%G2326><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Time <S%G2540><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Harvest <S%G2326><s%> I Will Say <S%G2046><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Harvest Men, <S%G2327><s%> Gather <S%G4816><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Darnel, <S%G2215><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bind <S%G1210><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1197><s%> Bundles <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Burn <S%G2618><s%> Them; <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Wheat <S%G4621><s%> Bring Together <S%G4863><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G596><s%> My Granary. <S%G3450><s%>

Another <S%G243><s%> Parable <S%G3850><s%> Put He Before <S%G3908><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> To A Grain <S%G2848><s%> Of Mustard, <S%G4615><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Having Taken, <S%G2983><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Sowed <S%G4687><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G68><s%> His Field; <S%G846><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> Less <S%G3398><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Than All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seeds, <S%G4690><s%> <S%G3752><s%> But When <S%G1161><s%> It Be Grown, <S%G837><s%> Greater <S%G3173><s%> Than The <S%G3588><s%> Herbs <S%G3001><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Becomes <S%G1096><s%> A Tree, <S%G1186><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Birds <S%G4071><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Roost <S%G2681><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Branches <S%G2798><s%> Of It. <S%G846><s%>

Another <S%G243><s%> Parable <S%G3850><s%> Spoke He <S%G2980><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> To Leaven, <S%G2219><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Having Taken, <S%G2983><s%> A Woman <S%G1135><s%> Hid <S%G1470><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> Of Meal <S%G224><s%> Seahs <S%G4568><s%> Three, <S%G5140><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G3739><s%> Was Leavened <S%G2220><s%> All. <S%G3650><s%>

These Things <S%G5023><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Parables <S%G3850><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds, <S%G3793><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Without <S%G5565><s%> A Parable <S%G3850><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> He Spoke <S%G2980><s%> To Them; <S%G846><s%>

So That <S%G3704><s%> Might Be Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Spoken <S%G4483><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet, <S%G4396><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> I Will Open <S%G455><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Parables <S%G3850><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> My Mouth : <S%G3450><s%> I Will Utter <S%G2044><s%> Things Hidden <S%G2928><s%> From The <S%G575><s%> Foundation <S%G2602><s%> Of The World. <S%G2889><s%>
